definitions.definition: To make a groove , hole , or mark in by scooping with or as if with a gouge .
examples: Japanese and Chinese printers used to gouge characters in wood.

definitions.definition: To cheat or impose upon; in particular, to charge an unfairly or unreasonably high price .
examples: The company has no competition, so it tends to gouge its customers.

definitions.definition: To dig or scoop (something) out with or as if with a gouge; in particular, to use a thumb to push or try to push the eye (of a person) out of its socket .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make a groove , hole , or mark in by scooping with or as if with a gouge .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To cheat or impose upon; in particular, to charge an unfairly or unreasonably high price .
( transitive , intransitive ) To dig or scoop (something) out with or as if with a gouge; in particular, to use a thumb to push or try to push the eye (of a person) out of its socket .
